    • Method Detail

      • list

        public org.gbif.api.model.common.paging.PagingResponse<org.gbif.api.model.checklistbank.NameUsage> list(@Context
                                                                                               Locale locale,
                                                                                               Set<UUID> datasetKeys,
                                                                                               String sourceId,
                                                                                               String canonicalName,
                                                                                               @Context
                                                                                               org.gbif.api.model.common.paging.Pageable page)
        This retrieves a list of all NameUsage from ChecklistBank. It is reachable at /species.
        Parameters:
        locale - identifier for a region
        datasetKeys - the optional checklist keys to limit paging to
        page - the limit, offset paging information
        Returns:
        requested list of NameUsage or an empty list if none could be found

      • get

        public org.gbif.api.model.checklistbank.NameUsage get(int usageKey,
                                             @Context
                                             Locale locale)
        This retrieves a NameUsage by its key from ChecklistBank. It is reachable at /species/<key>, with integers given as the key returning a single usage.
        Parameters:
        usageKey - NameUsage key
        locale - identifier for a region
        Returns:
        requested NameUsage or null if none could be found. List of NameUsage in case of a search.
        See Also:
        NameUsageService.get(int, Locale)

        public org.gbif.api.model.checklistbank.NameUsageMetrics getMetrics(int usageKey)

      • listChildren

        public org.gbif.api.model.common.paging.PagingResponse<org.gbif.api.model.checklistbank.NameUsage> listChildren(int parentKey,
                                                                                                       @Context
                                                                                                       Locale locale,
                                                                                                       @Context
                                                                                                       org.gbif.api.model.common.paging.Pageable page)
        This retrieves a list of children NameUsage for a parent NameUsage from ChecklistBank. It is reachable at /species/<key>/children.
        Parameters:
        parentKey - parent NameUsage key
        locale - identifier for a region
        page - the limit, offset paging information
        Returns:
        requested list of NameUsage or an empty list if none could be found
        See Also:
        NameUsageService.listChildren(int, Locale, Pageable)

      • listSynonyms

        public org.gbif.api.model.common.paging.PagingResponse<org.gbif.api.model.checklistbank.NameUsage> listSynonyms(int usageKey,
                                                                                                       @Context
                                                                                                       Locale locale,
                                                                                                       @Context
                                                                                                       org.gbif.api.model.common.paging.Pageable page)
        This retrieves a list of synonym NameUsage for a NameUsage from ChecklistBank. It is reachable at /species/<key>/synonyms.
        Parameters:
        usageKey - parent NameUsage key
        locale - identifier for a region
        page - the limit, offset, and count paging information
        Returns:
        requested list of NameUsage or an empty list if none could be found
        See Also:
        NameUsageService.listChildren(int, Locale, Pageable)

      • listRelatedByNameUsage

        public List<org.gbif.api.model.checklistbank.NameUsage> listRelatedByNameUsage(int usageKey,
                                                                      @Context
                                                                      Locale locale,
                                                                      Set<UUID> datasetKeys)
        This retrieves all related Usages for a NameUsage from ChecklistBank. It is reachable at /species/<key>/related.
        Parameters:
        usageKey - NameUsage key
        datasetKeys - The optional list of dataset keys to filter related usages
        Returns:
        a list of all Related usages
        See Also:
        NameUsageService.listRelated(int, Locale, UUID[])

      • listRootUsages

        public org.gbif.api.model.common.paging.PagingResponse<org.gbif.api.model.checklistbank.NameUsage> listRootUsages(UUID datasetKey,
                                                                                                         @Context
                                                                                                         Locale locale,
                                                                                                         @Context
                                                                                                         org.gbif.api.model.common.paging.Pageable page)
        This retrieves a list of root NameUsage for a Checklist from ChecklistBank. It is reachable at /species/root/<key>.
        Parameters:
        datasetKey - UUID or case insensitive shortname of the Checklist to retrieve
        locale - identifier for a region
        page - the limit, offset, and count paging information
        Returns:
        requested list of NameUsage or an empty list if none could be found
        See Also:
        NameUsageService.listRoot(UUID, Locale, Pageable)
